channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023121012
item.description:
Report X-2023121012

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY ONE POUND OF DRY ICE CHUNKS COOLING BEEF. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED IN THE AIR NETWORK. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2023120244
item.description:
Report X-2023120244

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-28
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR ACTIVE LEAKER, SECURED THE AREA. RESPONDER BLOCKED THE AREA OFF AND CALLED RNP TO COME UP HERE AND INSPECT THE PACKAGE. AFTER INSPECTION WE DECIDED TO TAKE THE LEAKER DOWN TO THE CLERK AREA, AND PROCESS. WHEN DONE PROCCESING THE CARDBOARD STARTED REACTING, AND THEN RNP TOOK THE PACKAGE OUTSIDE AND WATCHED IT SO IT DID NOT START A FIRE.
